description:
A special gift for the Bladelord! Includes a set of basic materials that are great for early-game forging.

Set includes:
Demonite Ore x9
Muddied Silver x18
Soldier's Wisdom x18
Earthfang x13
Magistone x10
Bladetree Leaf  x3
Vajrastone x10
Brutebeast Horn x10
Demon Bladewine x3
Manaform Eye x10
Blood Soul x10
Coolant x48
name: Beginner's Forging Kit
